name: Ensure to store global information in HttpSession, or use stateful session beans that are specifically targeted for this purpose
Ensure to use use local variables inside your methods, and pass whatever data you need to other methods in the class via parameters
Prefer not using this within Constructor in multi-thread environment to avoid unpredictable behavior
Prefer not using Double checked locking for JSE 4.x and previous version
Ensure to use version instead of timestamp
